projectGridLines.title: LTIMindtree- GTO-Tech Incubation-QC, PAN INDIA
projectGridLines.description:
Project Details : This role will involve hands-on development of industry solutions using quantum technologies.

The successful candidate:   

- Will be part of LTIMindtree’s GTO - Emerging Technology Group, and will focus on applied research to develop quantum-powered software applications and solutions for various Industries.

- Work with business units to identify and prioritize suitable Quantum Computing /Quantum Tech use cases. 

- Implement / reproduce / adapt recent research papers.

- Develop QC/QT proofs-of-concept, leading ultimately to commercially viable products and services. 

- Engage with QC/QT vendors and academic partners. 

- Participate in LTIMindtree’s quantum-related collaboration projects with external partners.


Skill sets :

• Strong in Linear Algebra and other foundational mathematics required for Deep Learning.

• Exposure to common deep neural network architectures and training deep neural networks.

• Working knowledge of PyTorch, and other relevant libraries.

• In-depth understanding of Transformer architecture, Attention techniques for language and vision.

• Ability to independently read, understand and explain deep learning research literature.

• Knowledge of GNNs preferred.
